title: General Electric : number of employees 2005 to 2018
summary: Overall Number of employees in thousands has decreased over the Year.
Number of employees in thousands is roughly constant from 2006 to 2008, gradually decreasing from 2008 to 2010, slightly increasing from 2010 to 2011, and lastly roughly constant from 2011 to 2014.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2008 and 2009.
Maximum Number of employees in thousands, about 327.0 was reported at Year 2007
The lowest Number of employees in thousands, of value 287.0 was reported at Year 2010
